projects.title: Age Calculator
projects.description: This challenge is designed to sharpen your JavaScript and form validation skills. Working with dates in JavaScript can be tricky, so this will be a nice test!

projects.title: Tip Calculator
projects.description: This small app is perfect for anyone starting to get to grips with JavaScript. The calculator functionality will be a nice test!

projects.title: sunnyside-agency-landing-page-main
projects.description: This design has some nice layout challenges in it. A perfect training ground to practice your Flexbox and/or Grid skills.

projects.title: Interactive rating component
projects.description: This design has some nice layout challenges in it. A perfect training ground to practice your Flexbox and/or Grid skills.

projects.title: Social media dashboard with theme switcher
projects.description: This challenge will be a perfect chance to practice your Grid skills. The color theme switcher also adds a nice additional test.

projects.title: Intro section with dropdown navigation
projects.description: This challenge will test your ability to create dropdown navigation menus, a common pattern on larger sites. It will also provide some nice basic layout challenges.

projects.title: Clipboard landing page
projects.description: Put your layout skills to the test with this HTML & CSS landing page challenge. This challenge includes a design for hover states.

projects.title: Fylo dark theme landing page
projects.description: This design has some nice layout challenges in it. A perfect training ground to practice your Flexbox and/or Grid skills.

projects.title: Newsletter sign-up form with success message
projects.description: This will test your skills with basic form structure, validation, and submission. The success state will also be an excellent opportunity to work with DOM manipulation.

projects.title: Huddle landing page with alternating feature blocks
projects.description: This challenge is perfect if you're wanting to practice your layout skills. If you're starting to get a bit more confident laying out a web page, give this project a go.

projects.title: FAQ accordion card
projects.description: In this challenge, you'll be building out an FAQ accordion. This is an extremely common front-end pattern, so it's a great opportunity to get some practice in!

projects.title: Project tracking intro component
projects.description: Some interesting layout and code challenges are baked into this design. Perfect if you're a beginner who is starting to get a bit more confident with your layouts.

projects.title: Loopstudios landing page
projects.description: This challenge is perfect if you're looking to test your CSS Grid chops. Even without Grid, this project will be a fun one to help you practice your layout skills!

projects.title: Interactive pricing component
projects.description: In this project, you'll build out an interactive pricing component complete with custom range input slider and pricing toggle. A perfect way to test your JS skills!

projects.title: Notifications page
projects.description: This project will be a brilliant test of your HTML, CSS, and basic JavaScript skills. You'll use JS to toggle the visual state of the notifications.

projects.title: Interactive card details form
projects.description: This fun project will be an excellent way to practice DOM manipulation and form validation while also putting your HTML and CSS skills to the test.

projects.title: Intro component with sign-up form
projects.description: Practice building out a sign-up form complete with client-side validation using JavaScript.

projects.title: Blogr landing page
projects.description: Flex your layout muscles with this landing page challenge. You'll mostly be working with HTML & CSS for this project with a tiny bit of JS for the mobile menu.

projects.title: Time tracking dashboard
projects.description: A perfect opportunity to practice your CSS Grid skills. For anyone wanting to take it up a notch, we provide a JSON data file to practice working with data.

projects.title: Four card feature section
projects.description: A nice layout-based challenge for beginners. This will test anyone who is new to multi-column and responsive layouts.

projects.title: Article preview component
projects.description: Practice your layout skills with this article preview component. There's lots of fun to be had playing around with animations for the sharing icons as well.
